entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:39 a.m. EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, 0.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 10:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 8 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: N 18 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:52 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:52 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:52 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:52 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
